name: pass-culture-institutional
description: Le pass Culture, dispositif porté par le ministère de la Culture, a pour but de faciliter l'accès des jeunes de 18 ans à la culture en leur offrant un crédit de 300€ à dépenser sur l'application pass Culture.

scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn setup:public_website && yarn setup:content_management_system
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn clear" "cd public_website && yarn dev" "cd content_management_system && yarn develop"
scripts.audit:all: concurrently "yarn audit" "cd public_website && yarn audit" "cd content_management_system && yarn audit"
scripts.test:lint: concurrently "cd public_website && yarn test:lint" "cd content_management_system && yarn test:lint"
scripts.test:types: concurrently "cd public_website && yarn test:types" "cd content_management_system && yarn test:types"
